front.title: NEMO Route Optimization Requirements for Operational Use in Aeronautics and Space Exploration Mobile Networks

abstract.t: This document describes the requirements and desired properties of NEMO Route Optimization techniques for use in global networked communications systems for aeronautics and space exploration. This version has been reviewed by members of the International Civil Aviation Orgnanization (ICAO) and other aeronautical communications standards bodies, and contributed to by a number of aeronautical communications experts outside the normal IETF process.
